metadata.dc:author: Verdú, Soriano J
Javares, Curto T
Barahona, M
Segovia, Gómez T
metadata.dc:description: In order to increase the clinical and scientific evidence of the Hyperoxygenated Fatty Acids (HFA) in emulsion preparation for skin care, this study considers to evaluate prospectively how it influences in the state of the periwound skin (when there are active lesions) or in which it presents a high risk of lesion production.
metadata.dc:title: Cuidados en piel perilesional o con riesgo de lesión.
[Caring for perilesional skin or skin having a lesion risk].
